Author: bondgorl
Text: Loading up on veggies and a protein like a nice big salad with chicken & apples in it for some reason makes me so full and not crave anything at all. When youâ€™re hungry your brain gets all creative like oh I bet a KitKat would taste good rn.  Then I remember last time I binged on KitKats and puked and got so sick of the taste of chocolate it makes me nauseous. Veggies give me this full but CLEAN feeling. A full tummy stuffed with salad and chicken is like please god no more food not even if itâ€™s the worlds best cake Iâ€™ll puke from how stuffed I am! On my period rn and this always works for me.
